results.title: Euphoria
results.brief_description: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.

constellations_other.name: If at first you don't succeed
constellations_other.description: Though originally intended as a laugh, Celeste Baberâ€™s social media posts have become examples of body positivity to her eight million followers and challenge the absurd expectations put on women in society.

results.description: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.
description_for_label: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.

results.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
results.brief_description: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.
results.description: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.

results.title: Escape from New York
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1981
results.brief_description: In 1997, the island of Manhattan has been walled off and turned into a giant maximum security prison within which the country’s worst criminals are left to form their own anarchic society. However, when the President of the United States crash lands on the island, the authorities turn to a former soldier and current convict to rescue him.

results.title: ER
results.brief_description: Explores the inner workings of an urban teaching hospital and the critical issues faced by the dedicated physicians and staff of its overburdened emergency room.
results.description: Explores the inner workings of an urban teaching hospital and the critical issues faced by the dedicated physicians and staff of its overburdened emergency room.
description_for_label: Explores the inner workings of an urban teaching hospital and the critical issues faced by the dedicated physicians and staff of its overburdened emergency room.

results.title: Enter the Void
results.brief_description: This psychedelic tour of life after death is seen entirely from the point of view of Oscar, a young American drug dealer and addict living in Tokyo with his prostitute sister, Linda. When Oscar is killed by police during a bust gone bad, his spirit journeys from the past — where he sees his parents before their deaths — to the present — where he witnesses his own autopsy — and then to the future, where he looks out for his sister from beyond the grave.
results.description: This psychedelic tour of life after death is seen entirely from the point of view of Oscar, a young American drug dealer and addict living in Tokyo with his prostitute sister, Linda. results.title: Empire Falls
results.creator_credit: Marc Platt Productions, HBO Films, Aspetuck Productions, Fred Schepisi, Donna Zakowska, Stuart Wurtzel, Richard Russo and William Teitler
results.brief_description: The humorous, poignant story of a declining New England town and its inhabitants, whose lives are deeply rooted in and influenced by the Knox River and its vacant mills, their class differences, and ghosts of the past.

constellations_other.name: Fred Schepisi
constellations_other.description: Fred Schepisi's diverse body of work connects to acclaimed local productions, westerns and Hollywood favourites.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Marc Platt Productions, HBO Films, Aspetuck Productions, Fred Schepisi, Donna Zakowska, Stuart Wurtzel, Richard Russo and William Teitler

results.title: Emak-Bakia
results.brief_description: Emak-Bakia (Basque for Leave me alone) is a 1926 film directed by Man Ray. Subtitled as a cinÃ©poÃ©me, it features many techniques Man Ray used in his still photography (for which he is better known), including Rayographs, double exposure, soft focus and ambiguous features. The film features sculptures by Pablo Picasso, and some of Man Ray’s mathematical objects both still and animated using a stop motion technique.

results.title: Elvira, Mistress of the Dark
results.creator_credit: New World Pictures, NBC Productions, James Signorelli, Sam Egan, John Paragon, Cassandra Peterson, Eric Gardner and Mark Pierson
results.brief_description: When her great aunt dies, famed horror hostess Elvira heads for the uptight new England town of Falwell to claim her inheritance of a haunted house, a witch’s cookbook and a punk rock poodle. But once the stuffy locals get an eyeful of the scream queen’s ample assets, all hell busts out & breaks loose.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooksâ€™ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

results.title: Elizabeth
results.creator_credit: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Working Title Films, Channel Four Films, Alexandra Byrne, John Myhre, Michael Hirst, Shekhar Kapur, Alison Owen, Eric Fellner and Tim Bevan
results.brief_description: The story of the ascension to the throne and the early reign of Queen Elizabeth the First, the endless attempts by her council to marry her off, the Catholic hatred of her and her romance with Lord Robert Dudley.

constellations_other.name: Wearing the pants, ladies who lead
constellations_other.description: The pre-code 1932 feature, A Bill of Divorcement, a glass cinema slide of which features in the glass cinema slide display, stars John Barrymore and Katharine Hepburn in her screen debut.

constellations_other.name: Jill Bilcock
constellations_other.description: An editorâ€™s work often goes unnoticed, but theyâ€™re scene-stitching not only brings the directorâ€™s vision to life but sometimes steals the show. One of Australiaâ€™s greatest editors, Jill Bilcock, has shaped some of the countryâ€™s most memorable screen stories.

results.title: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
results.creator_credit: Sony Pictures Television, Gran Via Productions, High Bridge Entertainment, Louise Frogley, Mark Johnson, Judy Rhee, Charles Newirth, Melissa Bernstein, Vince Gilligan and Aaron Paul
results.brief_description: In the wake of his dramatic escape from captivity, Jesse Pinkman must come to terms with his past in order to forge some kind of future.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.
